comment._content: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Richard_Strauss "Richard Georg Strauss (11 June 1864 – 8 September 1949) was a leading German composer of the late Romantic and early modern eras. " Looks to be from the same session as en.wikipedia.org/wiki/File:Richard_Strauss_%28b%29.jpg which is identified as having been published in Modern Music and Musicians, University Society, New York, 1918.
